context-param.description: A regular expression that defines which of the resources in the war file can be served by the portal war datasource.
A regular expression that defines which of the resources in the war file cannot be served by the portal war datasource.
A regular expression that defines which of the resources in the war file can be served by the portal res datasource.
A regular expression that defines which of the resources in the war file cannot be served by the portal res datasource.
